404.title: 404 Not Found
404.message: The page you are looking for does not exist

game.title: Game Not Found
game.message: The player you are looking for is not in an active game
game.messageWithDetails: Player {name}#{tag} is not currently in a game

player.title: Player Not Found
player.message: The player you are looking for was not found
player.messageWithDetails: Player {name}#{tag} was not found. Please check if their name and tag are correct

cookieConsent.message: We use cookies to personalize content and analyze our traffic. By clicking "Accept", you consent to our use of cookies.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: We're here to help! Whether you have questions about our product, need support, or want to share feedback, please reach out. You can contact any of our team members directly or use our general inquiry channels below.

descriptions.technical: For technical inquiries, partnerships, or feedback regarding our product, please get in touch.
descriptions.api: For questions about our API services or operational support, feel free to reach out.

generalInquiries.title: General Inquiries
generalInquiries.description: For general questions, partnership opportunities, or media inquiries, please email us at {email}

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.description: GONEXT is a GenAI-powered assistant tailored for League of Legends players, delivering real-time and personalized strategies, matchups, synergies, and builds. By harnessing the Riot API, GONEXT retrieves live game data—covering both allied and enemy players—and employs large language models to offer context-specific guidance for every match.

kostadin.name: Kostadin Devedzhiev
kostadin.title: Founder | ML | API | UI | ADC
kostadin.description:
Kostadin has been playing League of Legends since Season 3, achieving a peak rank of Diamond 1. He plays ADC and Jungle. His favorite champion is Wukong.

Kostadin leads engineering and product at GONEXT. He is a Software Engineer at Stellar Cyber.

ivan.name: Ivan Nikolov
ivan.title: API | DevOps | Jungle
ivan.description: Ivan specializes in API development and DevOps practices, ensuring robust, scalable, and secure backend services.

improvement.title: Making GONEXT Better
improvement.description:
Let us know what you want to see in future releases and report bugs. We will listen!
Email us at {email}.

defaultPrompts.createGamePlan: Create a game plan tailored to my role
defaultPrompts.prioritizeItems: What items should I prioritize this match?
defaultPrompts.laneMatchupTips: Give me tips for winning my lane matchup
defaultPrompts.weakestLink: Who's the weakest link on the enemy team?
